column4: IRQ's are done in the BIOS, but I'm not sure why you'd want to mess with that
My soundcard shares an IRQ with other processes, and I'm getting crazy xruns in jack for audio processing.  I'm just trying to figure out what will make them go away.
I suppose if you want to mess around with your IRQ settings, that will be done in the BIOS
Yeah, just no apparent way to do that.  I guess I'll have to research my BIOS a bit more. *sigh*
